snippet.title: Crimson Desert - Release Window Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2024
snippet.description:
Crimson Desert is coming to Steam, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Mac in late 2025! 
Add Crimson Desert to your Steam wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3321460 

Here begins the saga of Pywel, a continent swept by war for unprecedented power.  
Join Kliff and the Greymanes on their epic journey as they battle to save the land from an impending catastrophe. 
(This gameplay trailer contains actual in-game footage. As a work-in-progress, the content is subject to change.) 

What is Crimson Desert?   
Crimson Desert is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Pearl Abyss coming to PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Mac in late 2025. Through vibrant storytelling and intense action, Crimson Desert depicts realistic characters and narratives that revolve around the members of the Greymanes fighting to achieve their noble mission. 
Experience the beautiful yet brutal continent of Pywel, where you will witness the conflicts and epic sagas surrounding Kliff, the leader of the Greymanes, as his mission takes him on an unforgettable journey.  

Add Crimson Desert to your Steam wishlist and join the official channels to stay updated!  

Learn more:   
» Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3321460 
» Official Site: https://crimsondesert.pearlabyss.com   
» https://twitter.com/crimsondesert_   
» https://instagram.com/crimsondesert_   
» https://discord.gg/crimsondesert   
» https://facebook.com/crimsondesert  

#CrimsonDesert #Trailer #TheGameAwards 

About Pearl Abyss   
Best known for the Black Desert franchise, Pearl Abyss is a leading developer in the game industry. Established in 2010, Pearl Abyss has since developed Black Desert for PC, mobile, and console. The company is currently developing Crimson Desert, DokeV, and PLAN 8 on a next-gen proprietary engine. More information about Pearl Abyss is available at: https://www.pearlabyss.com
